document_card_ace_cups.name: Ace of Cups
document_card_ace_cups_1.desc: Inside the barn on some hay bales.
document_card_ace_cups_2.desc: On a barrel behind the run-down shed.
document_card_ace_cups_3.desc: On the nightstand in the bedroom on the right.
document_card_ace_cups_4.desc: On the barrel on the tower platform.
document_card_ace_cups_5.desc: On top of the cinema building on a square vent.
document_card_ace_cups_6.desc: On the railing on the east side, at the front of the boat.
document_card_two_cups.name: Two of Cups
document_card_two_cups_1.desc: On a barrel under the building.
document_card_two_cups_2.desc: On a crate on the lower deck of the railway bridge.
document_card_two_cups_5.desc: On top of the windmill, overlooking the town. Climb the ladder.
document_card_two_cups_6.desc: On a barrel at the end of the docks.
document_card_three_cups.name: Three of Cups
document_card_three_cups_1.desc: On the back of a wagon.
document_card_three_cups_2.desc: On the barrel near the scarecrow.
document_card_three_cups_4.desc: On top of bench on front porch.
document_card_three_cups_5.desc: On a crate on the east side of the building.
document_card_three_cups_6.desc: Outside the cabin on a table with a moonshine keg on it.
document_card_four_cups.name: Four of Cups
document_card_four_cups_1.desc: On top of fireplace inside building.
document_card_four_cups_2.desc: Western side of the white barn. On a bench next to wall.
document_card_four_cups_3.desc: On windowsill, in demolished building, by the outhouse.
document_card_four_cups_4.desc: On a crate, next to the fountain in the back alley.
document_card_four_cups_5.desc: On the balcony at the back of the sheriff's office.
document_card_four_cups_6.desc: On the roof of the bank at the front side. Climb the ladder at the back of the bank to reach.
document_card_five_cups.name: Five of Cups
document_card_five_cups_1.desc: On a table next to a scale.
document_card_five_cups_2.desc: Inside a shack. East side, on a stack of boxes.
document_card_five_cups_3.desc: On top of the Imperial Theatre, Climb the ladder at the back, the card is on the brick front, facing Blackwater Restaurant.
document_card_five_cups_4.desc: On a crate halfway through the mine.
document_card_five_cups_5.desc: On the bench on the southeast side of the building (at the head of the "T" on the map).
document_card_five_cups_6.desc: On the table immediately on the left of the door inside the building.
document_card_six_cups.name: Six of Cups
document_card_six_cups_2.desc: On the back of the wagon.
document_card_six_cups_4.desc: On a table, on the righthand side of the yellow and green house.
document_card_six_cups_5.desc: On a crate next to the corner of the house.
document_card_six_cups_6.desc: On top of the tower on the railing. Climb both ladders.
document_card_seven_cups.name: Seven of Cups
document_card_seven_cups_1.desc: On a barrel outside of the shed.
document_card_seven_cups_2.desc: Inside the bedroom, on the nightstand behind the door.
document_card_seven_cups_3.desc: Inside the house in a open cupboard.
document_card_seven_cups_4.desc: Inside the house on the fireplace.
document_card_seven_cups_5.desc: On the railing of the front porch.
document_card_seven_cups_6.desc: On an empty spool at the back of the barn.
document_card_eight_cups.name: Eight of Cups
document_card_eight_cups_1.desc: On a barrel underneath an awning.
document_card_eight_cups_2.desc: On the rightmost shelf at the shooting range.
document_card_eight_cups_4.desc: Front side of the house, on a table.
document_card_eight_cups_5.desc: On a barrel, underneath the covered section in the back.
document_card_eight_cups_6.desc: Inside the lighthouse on the bottom floor (after climbing the ladder, but before the stairs).
document_card_nine_cups.name: Nine of Cups
document_card_nine_cups_3.desc: On shelf on right side of entrance.
document_card_nine_cups_4.desc: On some boxes behind the outhouse.
document_card_nine_cups_5.desc: On the bench, next to the old train station.
document_card_nine_cups_6.desc: Inside the house, on the green cabinet in the corner.
document_card_ten_cups.name: Ten of Cups
document_card_ten_cups_1.desc: On the table beside bucket of water.
document_card_ten_cups_3.desc: Inside the barn on the back righthand side.
document_card_ten_cups_4.desc: Railway platform, on a southside wooden bench.
document_card_ten_cups_5.desc: On the back of the cart.
document_card_ten_cups_6.desc: On the table, upstairs on the second floor balcony.
document_card_knight_cups.name: Knight of Cups
document_card_knight_cups_2.desc: On a table, underneath the awning in the back.
document_card_knight_cups_3.desc: On a crate, under the awning of the barn.
document_card_knight_cups_4.desc: On a box with a sheet hanging next to it.
document_card_knight_cups_6.desc: On top of a crate, in the back of the 2nd Floor western bedroom.
document_card_page_cups.name: Page of Cups
document_card_page_cups_1.desc: On the windowsill in the north western room.
document_card_page_cups_3.desc: On the table near the water tubs.
document_card_page_cups_4.desc: On the fireplace inside the house.
document_card_page_cups_5.desc: On a bed in the back of the house.
document_card_page_cups_6.desc: Outside, on the table with some bunched up clothes.
document_card_queen_cups.name: Queen of Cups
document_card_queen_cups_1.desc: On top of the first nightstand to the right.
document_card_queen_cups_2.desc: On top of the barrel, on the right side of the dock.
document_card_queen_cups_3.desc: Inside the mine, on a crate next to a lantern.
document_card_queen_cups_4.desc: On a work table, on the west side of the northern stable.
document_card_queen_cups_5.desc: On the backside of the mansion on the balcony. Reachable by a flight of stairs on the southwestern side.
document_card_queen_cups_6.desc: On the main desk in the back of the building.
document_card_king_cups.name: King of Cups
document_card_king_cups_1.desc: On a table on the second floor. Walk up the stairs.
document_card_king_cups_2.desc: Go up the stairs located next to the slaughterhouse on the north-west side. The card is on the railing.
document_card_king_cups_4.desc: On a cupboard behind the sofa.
document_card_king_cups_5.desc: On a shelf in the back of the stables.
document_card_king_cups_6.desc: On the dining table as you enter the house.
document_card_ace_swords.name: Ace of Swords
document_card_ace_swords_1.desc: On uppermost level of windmill. Climb the ladders.
document_card_ace_swords_2.desc: In the windowsill on the upper floor of the barn.
document_card_ace_swords_4.desc: Inside the outhouse (the one with the fire outside it).
document_card_ace_swords_5.desc: On the green nightstand next to the fireplace.
document_card_ace_swords_6.desc: Outside, on the windowsill of the jail cell.
document_card_two_swords.name: Two of Swords
document_card_two_swords_1.desc: On the table on the front porch.
document_card_two_swords_2.desc: On the broken windowsill on the east side.
document_card_two_swords_3.desc: On some crates next to a wagon.
document_card_two_swords_4.desc: On a crate by an open fire in the graveyard.
document_card_two_swords_5.desc: On a table in the saloon.
document_card_three_swords.name: Three of Swords
document_card_three_swords_1.desc: On the windowsill southern side, next to the clothesline.
document_card_three_swords_2.desc: On top of the tower. Climb the ladders.
document_card_three_swords_3.desc: In the theatre tent on a chair in the front row.
document_card_three_swords_4.desc: On a table with some cloths.
document_card_three_swords_5.desc: On the railing of the hanging platform.
document_card_three_swords_6.desc: On a barrel next to the fence.
document_card_four_swords.name: Four of Swords
document_card_four_swords_1.desc: Up the ladder, on some wooden crates.
document_card_four_swords_2.desc: Outside on the table, by the south wall.
document_card_four_swords_5.desc: Outside the house on a worktable.
document_card_four_swords_6.desc: On the bench in the kitchen, next to the door.
document_card_five_swords.name: Five of Swords
document_card_five_swords_1.desc: On the white table, inside the gazebo.
document_card_five_swords_2.desc: On a bench under the front porch.
document_card_five_swords_3.desc: Behind the building on a crate.
document_card_five_swords_4.desc: On the dinner table inside the house.
document_card_five_swords_5.desc: On a windowsill on the north side of the small building.
document_card_five_swords_6.desc: On the crate between the two cabins.
document_card_six_swords.name: Six of Swords
document_card_six_swords_1.desc: On a barrel in a tent.
document_card_six_swords_3.desc: On top of the windmill tower.
document_card_six_swords_6.desc: Upstairs in the southern corner room. On the three-seater.
document_card_seven_swords.name: Seven of Swords
document_card_seven_swords_1.desc: Next to a blue barrel on the south west dock.
document_card_seven_swords_2.desc: In the back of a wagon on a green crate.
document_card_seven_swords_3.desc: Underneath the awning on a bench. (Caution: Watch out for a grizzly bear).
document_card_seven_swords_4.desc: Inside the house on a shelf in the basement floor.
document_card_seven_swords_6.desc: On the table next to a small broken cart.
document_card_eight_swords.name: Eight of Swords
document_card_eight_swords_1.desc: On a white table with a chess board.
document_card_eight_swords_2.desc: On a white table with a large ceramic bottle.
document_card_eight_swords_4.desc: Inside the Beaver Hollow/Murfree Gang cave, toward the lowest point.
document_card_eight_swords_5.desc: On a worktable next to the barn.
document_card_eight_swords_6.desc: On the worktable in the shack.
document_card_nine_swords.name: Nine of Swords
document_card_nine_swords_1.desc: On the back of the hay wagon.
document_card_nine_swords_2.desc: On top of the water tower. Need to climb ladder.
document_card_nine_swords_3.desc: Under the railing on top of the tower.
document_card_nine_swords_4.desc: On a railing on top of the house, climb the ladder inside.
document_card_nine_swords_5.desc: On a barrel on the second floor of the northwestern tower.
document_card_nine_swords_6.desc: On the railing post on the second floor balcony. Use the stairs at the back of the house.
document_card_ten_swords.name: Ten of Swords
document_card_ten_swords_1.desc: On a shelf above the coat hooks directly to the right.
document_card_ten_swords_2.desc: Outside the house on some crates at the northeast side.
document_card_ten_swords_3.desc: In the basement on a crate.
document_card_ten_swords_4.desc: Inside the building on a shelf (north wall).
document_card_ten_swords_5.desc: On a windowsill of the broken chapel.
document_card_ten_swords_6.desc: In the back of the cult building, next to the fire place.
document_card_knight_swords.name: Knight of Swords
document_card_knight_swords_2.desc: On the upper floor of the terrace. On the table by the window.
document_card_knight_swords_4.desc: On the table inside the shack.
document_card_knight_swords_5.desc: On a barrel on the second floor balcony of the station.
document_card_knight_swords_6.desc: On the fire pit underneath the awning of the barn.
document_card_page_swords.name: Page of Swords
document_card_page_swords_1.desc: On the windowsill of the outhouse.
document_card_page_swords_2.desc: On the log bench with a lantern on it.
document_card_page_swords_3.desc: Sitting on crates beside a pile of silver pipes.
document_card_page_swords_4.desc: On a barrel on the right side of the exterior of the house.
document_card_page_swords_5.desc: On a storage shelf in the shack.
document_card_page_swords_6.desc: On a green crate in front of the "Kerosene Storage" lettering.

document_card_queen_swords_1.desc: Inside building, on shelf against south wall.
document_card_queen_swords_4.desc: Inside the shed, on a barrel with kerosene lamp.
document_card_queen_swords_5.desc: Inside the train garage on a worktable on the south side of the building.
document_card_queen_swords_6.desc: On the back of the wagon near some workers' tents.
document_card_king_swords.name: King of Swords
document_card_king_swords_1.desc: On the shelf behind the counter in Algernon Wasp's Shop.
document_card_king_swords_3.desc: On top of a blue barrel, inside the fenced-in area.
document_card_king_swords_4.desc: Inside the shack, on the table to the right.
document_card_king_swords_5.desc: On a strut of the foundation of the old log mill.
document_card_king_swords_6.desc: On a crate, about halfway through the cave.

document_card_ace_wands_1.desc: On top of the piano in the corner of the room inside the house, on ground floor.
document_card_ace_wands_2.desc: Inside the house, on the western table with a lot of bottles.
document_card_ace_wands_3.desc: Inside barn, it is on the left shelf.

document_card_ace_wands_5.desc: On the railing, next to the entrance of the chapel.
document_card_ace_wands_6.desc: On a barrel, in the little shack.

document_card_two_wands_1.desc: On a bench, on the patio of the house.
document_card_two_wands_2.desc: On a side table, on the front porch.
document_card_two_wands_3.desc: On the side of the pier.
document_card_two_wands_4.desc: On top of a barrel, on the right inside the barn.
document_card_two_wands_5.desc: On the ledge before climbing the stairs to go out of the cave.
document_card_two_wands_6.desc: On the table inside with the telegraph machine on it.

document_card_three_wands_1.desc: Outside on the left side of the chimney.
document_card_three_wands_2.desc: In the back of the graveyard on "Samantha Worth's" grave.
document_card_three_wands_3.desc: In the end of the pier.
document_card_three_wands_4.desc: Behind the house (north side), on wooden crates.
document_card_three_wands_5.desc: On a shelf in the room in the eastern corner on the ground floor.
document_card_three_wands_6.desc: On a stack of crates in the northeastern tower.

document_card_four_wands_2.desc: On a table inside the shack.
document_card_four_wands_3.desc: Right side as you enter a cabin. On a high shelf.
document_card_four_wands_4.desc: On a wooden stand near the east wall of the building.

document_card_five_wands_2.desc: In the bookshelf in the kitchen.
document_card_five_wands_3.desc: On barrel right beside the fence.
document_card_five_wands_6.desc: On the storage shelf in the building.

document_card_six_wands_4.desc: Ground floor, room 1A, on the fireplace.

document_card_six_wands_6.desc: On top of the crate on the mine cart track.

document_card_seven_wands_2.desc: On the table on the front porch.
document_card_seven_wands_3.desc: On the windowsill of a broken down building.

document_card_seven_wands_5.desc: On the table on the front porch of the hermit's shack.
document_card_seven_wands_6.desc: On the table immediately to your right as you enter the cabin.

document_card_eight_wands_1.desc: On a shelf against the south wall of saloon.
document_card_eight_wands_2.desc: On a barrel on the top floor of the barn.

document_card_king_wands_5.desc: On the chair in front of the fireplace.

help.pins_place_new: Creates a new pin in the centre of the currently displayed map.
help.show_customization: Toggles whether the customisation settings should be visible in the menu.
help.marker_color: Set a colour theme or a specific colour for item markers. “Auto” options switch colour in dark mode.
mp_animal_alligator_legendary_02.desc: This alligator has been spotted by residents in Lakay. It has a distinctive orange colouring which can be easy to spot among the green and brown of the bayou. It is patient and cunning, biding its time before it takes down prey. It is rarely seen outside the early hours of the morning and favours heavy fog and mist.
mp_animal_bison_legendary_01.desc: This subspecies of bison has been spotted grazing near Heartland Overflow. It can be distinguished from common black bison by the white colouring across its head and back. Large and muscular, these creatures will charge if provoked. They are most commonly spotted during the day, in rain and drizzly weather.
mp_animal_moose_legendary_01.desc: This moose has been sighted near Barrow Lagoon. With its white colouring, it blends naturally into the snowy landscape. However, its large black antlers are easier to spot. It is a solitary creature and will flee if approached. Sightings have been reported at night, with the animal preferring wet weather.
